name: Philosopher Toga
desc:
Provides a new skill 💭 Curious Thought.
5% chance to think (and rest) anywhere.

name: Crystal Shield
desc:
Provides a new skill 💠 Reflect Magic.
33% chance to resist enemy spells.

name: Obsidian Heart
desc:
Provides a new skill 🖤 Unbreakable.
Resist +1 ⚔️ physical damage.

name: Backup Heart
desc:
Provides a new skill 💀 Cheat Death Sentece.
Get a second chance to live upon dying.

name: Offensive Scales
desc: Trade 1/2 ❤️ Health for that much ⚔️ Attack.

name: Magic Stick
desc: Trade 1/2 🟢 Energy for more 🔵 Mana.

name: Gambling Dice
desc:
Sacrifice 1/2 ❤️ Health for 🎲 Pure Chance.
33% chance to resist physical damage.

name: Weeping Rose
desc:
Sacrifice -1 ❤️ for 🥀 Thorns Payback.
Deal -1 💔 when hit by any physical attack.

name: Enchanted Line
desc: 33% chance to keep the bait 🪱 when fishing.

name: Schrödinger's Box
desc:
Provides a new skill 📦 Dead or Alive.
50% chance to avoid death on fatal hit.

name: Unstable Shield
desc:
Provides a new skill 🛡 Random Block.
33% chance to avoid physical damage.

name: Sinister Idol
desc:
🪬 Curse gets 33% chance to 🧬 Polymorph.
Transform the enemy to a random critter.

name: Raptor Feather
desc:
Provides a new skill ⚡️ Quick Reflexes.
33% chance to generate 🟢 Energy on action.

name: Radiating Oracle
desc:
Provides a new skill 👁️ Vivid Dream.
33% chance to get +1 🔵 Mana on 💤 Sleep.

name: Salt Shaker
desc:
Add a new option to 🧂 Add Salt on food.
Add +1 🟢 Energy & remove negative effects.

name: Unknown Experiment
desc:
🧬 Polymorph into a random creature.
Drink solely at your own risk.

name: Life-Stealing Rune
desc:
Melee ⚔️ Attacks have 33% chance
to restore +1 ❤️ Health on a successful hit.

name: Tarot Card — Berserk
